div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 541 Plumbuita (formerly Colentina), out- (823) skirts of Bucharest, Rumania, 1912 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: 500-600 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: M. Romascanu, Bucharest, some; Bucharest (Acad.) some; Bucha- rest (Hist. Mus.) some Romascanu, Tezaurul de la Colentina (Bucharest, 1932), illus. (3 coins) Moisil, Cabinetul numismatic 1938-42, p. 10; Balcania 1944, p. 14
